dlmanager.name: Download Manager
dlmanager.description: Upload .torrent or .nzb files to queue downloads.
dlmanager.install_files: dlmanager.xml, __init__.py, Extractor.py, NZBClient.py, NZBParser.py, TextDecoder.py, html/jman.html, html/jmanlite.html, package.xml, js/common.js, js/jman.js, js/jmanlite.js, css/style.css, images/nzb.png, images/torrent.png, images/unrar.png, images/par2.png
dlmanager.update_files: __init__.py, Extractor.py, NZBClient.py, NZBParser.py, TextDecoder.py html/jman.html, html/jmanlite.html, package.xml, js/common.js, js/jman.js, js/jmanlite.js, css/style.css, images/nzb.png, images/torrent.png, images/unrar.png, images/par2.png
